function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Increase in transmission rate and infection risk","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, using air purifiers, and wearing masks","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C light air purifiers, and ventilation monitoring systems","People":"Passengers on the plane, airline staff, and potentially the general public","Owner":"Airlines, aviation authorities, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Impact of air pollution on viral infection","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and severity of viral infection","Mitigation":"Reducing air pollution, monitoring air quality, and promoting respiratory health","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, emission controls, and public awareness campaigns","People":"Residents in areas with high air pollution, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Environmental agencies, local governments, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate infection control measures during evacuation","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 despite quarantine and separation procedures","Mitigation":"Improving infection control protocols, implementing stricter quarantine measures, and using rapid testing methods","Technologies":"Rapid antigen tests, PCR testing, and contact tracing apps","People":"Passengers on the evacuation flight, airline staff, and public health authorities","Owner":"Aviation authorities, public health agencies, and medical teams"}]}
